sentences.sContent: Scores of messages on his pager have not been answered.
sentences.sCn: 他寻呼机上的许多信息都还没有回复。

words.tran: 用传呼机传呼（page的现在分词形式）

trans.tranOther: a small machine you can carry in your pocket that can receive signals from a telephone. It tells you when someone has sent you a message, or wants you to telephone them, for example by making a noise.
